They are all later people who, according to their own preferences, copied out excerpts from the great texts
and circulated them separately.
Some held verses and passages and made them into scrolls and sections.
Because of this, in the latter years, the deceptions and abuses proliferated day by day.
Now they should be included to uphold the fundamental texts.

, from the Dharma Phrases down to the eight sutras.
They were all created by Xiao Ziliang.
Therefore, they are appended to the spurious records.
The previous fifty-three sÅ«tras are all called deviant from the truth.
Some begin with the golden words of the Buddha but end with heretical prophecies.
Some discuss worldly techniques and later use Buddhist terms.
Some cite the auspicious and inauspicious of yin and yang.
Some clarify the blessings and misfortunes of spirits and ghosts.
All of these are clearly false and deceptive.
They should now be secretly hidden to save the world from trouble.Here is the corrected and aligned text:
The Catalogue of Buddhist Scriptures, Scroll 4
